courses.title: Applications of AI/ML in Operations and Supply Chain Management
courses.description: Comprehensive overview of AI and ML applications in operations and supply chain. Covers discrete event simulation with Python and SimPy, reinforcement learning algorithms for job shop scheduling and intra-logistics optimization. Final project involves agent modeling for highly automated logistics environments.

courses.title: Project Management
courses.description: Methodological competencies for industrial project planning, scheduling, and management. Covers cost, time, and quality control techniques, risk management, stakeholder management, KPI analysis and variance analysis.

courses.title: Basic Principles of Data Analytics and Optimization for Logistics and Operations Management Processes
courses.university: Doctoral School "Enzo Ferrari" in Mechanical and Vehicle Engineering
courses.description: Introduction to data analytics approaches and development/validation of optimization methods for logistics and operations management processes.
